overview: An omnibus queer movie about three fathers with families.  Part 1: ‘My Father’s Desire’ is about a father who feels desire because of his son.  Part 2: ‘My Father’s Truth’ is about father and son, who are drawn to one man.  Part 3, ‘My Father’s Secret’ talks about a father who finds a gay magazine in his kindergartener son’s bag.
title: All About My Father
